entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers or periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
